GET IN TOUCH

Cyantra® will locate and shut down OTT bypass thieves

OTT bypass fraud is a colossal threat to the business model of how all operators are compensated for the services they provide billions of dollars of stolen revenue each year.

AMG (2015) estimates that 65 % of smartphone users worldwide were active users of IP Messaging services such as WhatsApp, Viber, etc.

OTT bypass thieves may do free calls and messaging, without payment

Free calls and messaging between OTT users - a serious threat for telecom operators.

Cyantra is a field proven solution utilizing the latest in packet and data analysis tools to identify and shut down OTT bypass thieves.

It's magic! InPacket® Taboo® dynamic content filtration

InPacket Taboo supports a rich set of functionalities and an array of network integration techniques that allow it to satisfy the needs of both fixed and mobile operators.

80 000 000 urls

Categorization engine with more than 80 Million urls, sorted into 100+ categories

SOAP or REST api

The inPacket Taboo solution is seamlessly integrated into service provisioning/service activation workflows using existing SOAP or REST API interfaces.

RADIUS and DIAMETER

One of the key features of Taboo is our Per-User policy architecture. In combination with a user detection mechanism we support RADIUS and DIAMETER protocol analysis. Based on RADIUS/DIAMETER data we are able to map user IP address on user account/MSISDN inside our platform.

Safe social networking

Safe Lagoon helps you monitor your kids social network activities and provides you information on their interactions.

Instant notifications

Safe Lagoon alerts you of suspicious online activities while protecting your children from predators and cyberbullies.

Block dangerous websites

Safe Lagoon is always on and working to blcok dangerous internet sites on your child's tablet or mobile phone.

Where is your child?

Safe Lagoon provides you location information of your child's device and keeps you updated on their movements.
